data.enText: the act of making sth better; the process of sth becoming better

data.chText: 销售额持续显示出增加的迹象。
data.enText: Sales figures continue to show signs of improvement.

data.chText: 你的工作尚有改进的余地。
data.enText: There is still room for improvement in your work.

data.chText: 我们期望来年会有更进一步的改善。
data.enText: We expect to see further improvement over the coming year.
a change in sth that makes it better; sth that is better than it was before

data.chText: 重要的 / 实质的 / 巨大的改进
轻微的 / 稳定的提升
你的工作比先前有很大进步。
data.enText: This is a great improvement on your previous work.

example: their improvements increased the value of the property

tr: a condition superior to an earlier condition
example: the new school represents a great improvement

value.def: If there is an improvement in something, it becomes better. If you make improvements to something, you make it better.

example.ex: ...the dramatic improvements in organ transplantation in recent years...
example.tran: 近几年器官移植方面取得的巨大进步

example.ex: There is considerable room for improvement in state facilities for treating the mentally handicapped.
example.tran: 国家现有的用于智障病人治疗的设施还有相当大的改进余地。

value.def: If you say that something is an improvement on a previous thing or situation, you mean that it is better than that thing.

example.ex: The new Prime Minister is an improvement on his predecessor...
example.tran: 新上任的总理比他的前任要强。

example.ex: The system we introduced in 1980 has been a great improvement.
example.tran: 我们 1980 年引进的系统有了很大改进。

value.tran: 更优秀之物;改善的事物

trans: 持续改进；持续改善；持续进步；连续改进；不断改进
品质改进；质量提高；品質改良；质量提升；质量改进
改进的余地；改善的余地；改进的空间
持续改进；持续改善；连续不断改进；持續性改善
(为增值进行的)房屋修缮，家居装修
土壤改良；地基加固；改良土壤
产品改进；产品改进与优化；产品改良；产品改善；问题解决方案
自我提高；提高自我；自我改进；自我提升；自我改善
帕累托改进；累托改善；帕雷托改进；帕累托优化；帕累托改良
